remarks: Formula-building rule for restricted universal quantifier (deduction rule).  (Contributed by NM, 24-Feb-2004.)
statement:
2ralbida.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
2ralbida.2 $e |- F/ y ph $.
2ralbida.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
2ralbida $p |- ( ph -> ( A. x e. A A. y e. B ps <-> A. x e. A A. y e. B ch ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d x y $.
